lessons.title: Lesson 0 - Introduction
lessons.desc: Get started with Pinyin, tones, and Chinese pronunciation.

lessons.title: Lesson 1 - Tones
lessons.desc: Learn the 4 tones of Mandarin with examples and practice audio.

lessons.title: Lesson 2 - Basic Greetings
lessons.desc: Learn greetings, introductions, and farewells in Chinese.

lessons.title: Lesson 3 - Relationships
lessons.desc: Explore family and relationship words in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 4 - Pronouns
lessons.desc: Learn I, You, He, She, and They in Chinese.

lessons.title: Lesson 5 - Numbers 0 to 10
lessons.desc: Master counting from 1 to 10 in Chinese.

lessons.title: Lesson 6 - Yes / No Basics
lessons.desc: Understand how to say yes and no in conversations.

lessons.title: Lesson 7 - Polite Phrases & Needs
lessons.desc: Say please, thank you, and express needs politely.

lessons.title: Lesson 8 - Days & Time
lessons.desc: Talk about days, weeks, and time in Chinese.

lessons.title: Lesson 9 - Country & Introduction
lessons.desc: Learn to say where you’re from and your nationality.

lessons.title: Lesson 10 - Colors & Descriptions
lessons.desc: Learn colors in Mandarin and how to describe objects.

lessons.title: Lesson 11 - Foods & Drinks
lessons.desc: Learn common foods, drinks, and eating-related phrases in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 12 - Weather & Nature
lessons.desc: Learn weather terms, nature words, and environmental phrases.

lessons.title: Lesson 13 - Daily Activities
lessons.desc: Learn daily routine verbs and expressions in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 14 - At the Market
lessons.desc: Learn shopping phrases, fruits, vegetables, and bargaining words.

lessons.title: Lesson 15 - Clothes & Shopping
lessons.desc: Learn clothing items, shopping phrases, and sizes in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 16 - Transport & Directions
lessons.desc: Learn transport vocabulary and giving or following directions.

lessons.title: Lesson 17 - Review & Speaking
lessons.desc: Review lessons and practice speaking with real-life projects.

lessons.title: Lesson 18 - Describing People
lessons.desc: Learn how to describe people in Mandarin: appearance, age, and personality.

lessons.title: Lesson 19 - Feelings & Health
lessons.desc: Learn how to express feelings, emotions, and talk about health.

lessons.title: Lesson 20 - Question Words
lessons.desc: Learn basic question words to ask questions in Mandarin.

lessons.title: Lesson 21 - Numbers 11–100
lessons.desc: Learn numbers from 11 to 100 and how to use them in sentences.

lessons.title: Lesson 22 - House & Rooms
lessons.desc: Learn vocabulary related to houses, rooms, and furniture.

lessons.title: Lesson 23 - School & Learning
lessons.desc: Learn words related to school, studying, exams, and classroom objects.

lessons.title: Lesson 24 - Technology
lessons.desc: Learn vocabulary for technology, devices, internet, apps, and software.

lessons.title: Lesson 25 - Review & Speaking Project
lessons.desc: Review previous lessons and practice speaking with projects.

lessons.title: Lesson 26 - At the Restaurant
lessons.desc: Learn restaurant vocabulary: menu, ordering, food, and tableware.

lessons.title: Lesson 27 - At the Market
lessons.desc: Learn market vocabulary: fruits, prices, weighing, and cashier terms.

lessons.title: Lesson 28 - Travel & Hotel
lessons.desc: Learn travel and hotel vocabulary: tickets, passports, luggage, and check-in.

lessons.title: Lesson 29 - Emergency & Help
lessons.desc: Learn emergency and help-related vocabulary: police, fire, danger, and first aid.

lessons.title: Lesson 30 - Making Plans
lessons.desc: Learn making plans vocabulary: time, date, meeting, and place.

lessons.title: Lesson 31 - Work & Business Basics
lessons.desc: Learn work and business basics vocabulary: company, boss, colleagues, and meetings.

lessons.title: Lesson 32 - Review & Speaking Project
lessons.desc: Review recent lessons and practice speaking with projects.

lessons.title: Lesson 33 - Advanced Work & Communication
lessons.desc: Learn advanced vocabulary for work, communication, emails, and arranging tasks.

lessons.title: Lesson 34 - At the Restaurant
lessons.desc: Learn how to ask for the menu, order food and drinks, express taste preferences, and handle the bill in a restaurant.

lessons.title: Lesson 35 - Asking for Directions
lessons.desc: Learn to ask for and give directions, understand location phrases, and express distance in Chinese.

lessons.title: Lesson 36 - Travel Sentences
lessons.desc: Learn travel-related sentences for going to the airport or train station, asking about tickets, schedules, reservations, and taxi services.

lessons.title: Lesson 37 - Emergency Sentences
lessons.desc: Learn how to ask for help, report lost items, call the police or ambulance, and express health issues or gratitude in emergencies.

lessons.title: Lesson 38 - Everyday Small Talk
lessons.desc: Learn common small talk phrases for talking about the weather, food preferences, daily activities, and greeting for weekends, birthdays, and New Year.

lessons.title: Lesson 39
lessons.desc: Intermediate lesson content from Unit 5.

lessons.title: Lesson 40
lessons.desc: Intermediate lesson content from Unit 6.

lessons.title: Lesson 41
lessons.desc: Intermediate lesson content from Unit 6.

lessons.title: Lesson 42
lessons.desc: Intermediate lesson content from Unit 6.

lessons.title: Lesson 43 - Asking for Directions
lessons.desc: Learn phrases to ask for toilets, banks, and other locations, understand instructions like left, right, straight, and express distance or thanks.

lessons.title: Lesson 44 - Travel Sentences
lessons.desc: Learn to talk about going to airports, train stations, asking ticket prices, departure and arrival times, making reservations, requesting room keys and Wi-Fi, and calling taxis.

lessons.title: Lesson 45 - Emergency Sentences
lessons.desc: Learn emergency phrases including asking for help, reporting lost wallets, calling police or ambulance, expressing illness, seeing a doctor, and reassuring others.

lessons.title: Lesson 46 - Everyday Small Talk
lessons.desc: Learn small talk phrases to discuss weather, food preferences, destinations, daily routines, and greetings for weekends, birthdays, and New Year.
